metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9454 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In the Android kernel in i2c driver there is a possible out of bounds writedue to memory corruption. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
